snippet: Manchester United wiped out Manchester City’s lead in England’s Premier League on Tuesday, beating Stoke, 2-0, as City lost Everton, 1-0, on a goal by a former United player, Darron Gibson.
abstract: Manchester United defeats Stoke, 2-0, to wipe out Manchester City's lead in England's Premier League after City's 1-0 loss to Everton; other soccer results noted.
lead_paragraph: Manchester United wiped out Manchester City’s lead in England’s Premier League on Tuesday, beating Stoke, 2-0, as City lost Everton, 1-0, on a goal by a former United player, Darron Gibson.
